abstract: Philadelphia demolition contractor Griffin Campbell is found guilty of six counts of involuntary manslaughter in connection with collapse of brick wall onto adjacent store during June 2013 demolition project.
lead_paragraph: A demolition contractor charged in the deaths of six people buried in debris from a building collapse in Philadelphia was found guilty Monday of six counts of involuntary manslaughter.
snippet: A demolition contractor charged in the deaths of six people buried in debris from a building collapse in Philadelphia was found guilty Monday of six counts of involuntary manslaughter.
